patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+// tailwind.config.ts
+import type { Config } from 'tailwindcss'
+
+const config: Config = {
+  content: [
+    './app/**/*.{ts,tsx}', 
+    './pages/**/*.{ts,tsx}', 
+    './components/**/*.{ts,tsx}'
+  ],
+  plugins: [
+    require('daisyui'),
+    // add more plugins here if needed
+  ],
+  // DaisyUI options (optional)
+  // @ts-expect-error: daisyui is a plugin-specific option not in Tailwind's type
+  daisyui: {
+    themes: ['light', 'dark'], 
+    // customize themes or other options here
+  }
+}
+
+// @ts-ignore: Allow daisyui property for Tailwind config
+export default config
